types.html:
taper dans l'œil

  1. (informal, of a person) to catch someone's eye, to strike someone's fancy, to appeal [with à ‘to someone’]
    Elle lui a tapé dans l'œil, il n'arrête pas de penser à elle depuis hier.
    She caught his eye; he hasn't stopped thinking about her since yesterday.

See also

[edit]
  • coup de foudre
  • avoir une touche
trans: to catch someone's eye, to strike someone's fancy, to appeal .mw-parser-output .object-usage-tag{font-style:italic}.mw-parser-output .deprecated{color:olivedrab}
